Daisy-chaining monitors connect a series of display devices to the computer through the display port of a monitor-to-monitor cord connection, rather than connecting each device directly to the computer.

Ergonomic Design

LG 24QP750-B 23.8-inch monitor features an ergonomic design. The ergonomic design has a one-click stand and is easy to install. It helps to adjust the height, tilt, swivel, and bi-direction according to your position. and optimize your work environment in this facility.

Reader Mode & Flicker Safe

full_description:
LG 28MQ780-B 27.6-Inch Nano IPS DualUp Monitor with Ergo Stand

The LG 28MQ780-B 27.6" Nano IPS DualUp Monitor can let you multitask better. The DualUp stacks two QHD panels atop each other to produce a single 2560 x 2880 resolution display with a 16:18 aspect ratio, providing programmers, content creators, designers, and office professionals with a comprehensive and extremely flexible viewing environment. This vertical design saves desk space while providing all of the benefits of a dual-monitor arrangement, such as the ability to see numerous apps and windows at the same time. For best viewing, the accompanying Ergo stand allows you to extend, retract, and swivel the screen, as well as change its height and tilt. A built-in ambient light sensor extends the viewing experience by automatically regulating screen brightness in response to changing environmental circumstances. The screen itself is intended to offer crisp, color-accurate pictures with strong dynamic range capability. Use the two HDMI ports or the DisplayPort input to connect the LG DualUp to your system. Alternatively, you may eliminate desktop clutter by clicking compatible laptops to the USB Type-C connector and transferring video, data, and up to 90W of power via a single wire. In Picture-by-Picture mode, you may set video feeds from numerous sources next to one another. Furthermore, the USB Type-C connection enables you to utilize the monitor's built-in KVM switch to operate numerous PCs with a single mouse and keyboard set. A dual-port USB hub and inbuilt stereo speakers are among the other features.

Stacking Up & Rich Color

The DualUp's vertical shape aids in multitasking efficiency while not taking up too much desktop space. The 27.6" IPS panel is factory calibrated to accommodate up to 1.07 billion colors, spanning 98% of the DCI-P3 gamut to provide realistic photographs and movies. HDR10 compatibility improves photographs by giving dazzling highlights and deep shadows. A 1000:1 static contrast ratio, 300 nits of brightness, and a 5 ms GtG reaction time are also included.

Ergo Stand

Both the supplied Ergo stand supports C-clamp and grommet desk mounting. With a simple click, the monitor is firmly attached to the stand, elevating it off the worktop and giving you more room. Once connected, you may extend and retract the screen as well as modify its height, tilt, and swivel.

Connectivity

The LG 28MQ780-B 27.6" Nano IPS DualUp Monitor has two HDMI 2.0 and two DisplayPort 1.4 ports, as well as USB Type-C connectivity with compatible laptops. To listen privately, insert a set of headphones into the 3.5mm audio jack.

Single Cable Connection & Multi-Device Support

Reduce desktop clutter by exchanging video, data, and up to 90W of power through a single USB Type-C cable with compatible laptops. When you connect the USB Type-C port to your system, you may also utilize the inbuilt KVM switch and the dual-port 5 Gb/s USB 3.0 Type-A hub. With Picture-by-Picture (PbP) support, you can view content from up to two computers simultaneously. Use the KVM to operate the systems with a single mouse and keyboard, connected to the monitor's USB 2.0 ports.

Immersive Audio

The LG 28MQ780-B's Maxx Audio enhanced stereo speaker system offers simulated surround sound to your music, movie, and gaming experiences.

Ambient Light Sensor & Dynamic Action Sync

The built-in sensor responds to light, making the screen brighter in bright places and darker in dark regions for a pleasant working environment. Reduce input lag with Dynamic Action Sync, which allows players to capture important moments in real-time.

Black Stabilizer & OnScreen Control

Black Stabilizer assists players in avoiding snipers lurking in the darkest corners and rapidly escaping situations when the flash bursts. Using the downloaded OnScreen Control software program, you may personalize the workspace by dividing the display view or modifying basic monitor features with a few mouse clicks. The LG 28MQ780-B 27.6" Nano IPS DualUp Monitor comes with a 03-year warranty.

full_description:
LG 32GQ950-B 32 Inch UltraGear 4K UHD 144Hz 1ms G-Sync Nano IPS Gaming Monitor

The LG 32GQ950-B is a 32-inch 4K UHD gaming monitor with a fast refresh rate of 144 Hz. It's part of LG's UltraGear gaming monitor lineup and one of the first on the market to support HDMI 2.1 bandwidth, making it an excellent choice for next-generation console gamers. It provides an excellent gaming experience with low input lag, quick response time, and support for NVIDIA and FreeSync Premium Pro variable refresh rate technology. The LG 32GQ950-B 32-inch gaming monitor also comes with FreeSync Premium Pro technology. It reduces screen tearing and stuttering and allows gamers to experience seamless, fluid movement in high-resolution, fast-paced games. The LG 32GQ950-B 32-inch UltraGear Monitor's color accuracy and consistency can be improved by using hardware calibration via the LG Calibration Studio.

UHD 4K (3840x2160) Resolution

The LG 32GQ950-B 32-inch supports UHD 4K video and variable refresh rates up to 120 Hz via HDMI 2.1. This provides console gamers with an immersive gaming experience. The 32GQ950-B 32-inch gaming monitor has a refresh rate of up to 144 Hz (O/C 160 Hz). But, when using an HDMI 2.1 cable, it supports 4K and a variable refresh rate of 120 Hz.

Nano IPS Display

The LG 32GQ950-B 32-inch UltraGear 4K UHD 144Hz G-Sync Nano IPS Gaming Monitor has Nano IPS technology. The Nano-IPS technology enhances color expression. This technology has a broad color gamut that covers 98 percent of the digital gaming industry's standard DCI-P3 color space and 135 percent of sRGB, making it ideal for expert-level creative work like high-resolution image retouching with large amounts of color information.

Ultra-fast 1ms(GtG)

The LG 32GQ950-B nano IPS gaming monitor has a response time of 1 ms (gray to gray). The 1 ms response time reduces ghosting and allows you to experience a whole new level of gaming performance.

VESA Display Stream Compression Technology

The LG 32GQ950-B 32-inch Nano IPS gaming monitor features VESA Display Stream Compression Technology and supports 4K hi-resolution. The high-speed refresh rate of 144Hz (O/C 160Hz) with 1ms (GtG) response time, HDR, and G-Sync compatibility, as well as covering 10 bits of color with a single DisplayPort connection, reduces visual loss..

Customized Modes for Any Game

The LG 32GQ950-B 32-inch Nano IPS gaming monitor offers customized modes for any game. Gamers can tailor their experience by choosing between gamer, FPS, and RTS modes. The settings can be adjusted and optimized for any game.

full_description:
LG 48GQ900-B 48-inch UltraGear UHD OLED 120Hz Gaming Monitor

The LG UltraGear 47.5" 4K HDR 120 Hz Gaming Monitor lets you capture every detail while you explore huge worlds and compete with others. This 4K OLED display with a resolution of 3840 by 2160 provides big-screen enjoyment with sharp graphics. It was created with devoted gamers and enthusiasts in mind. With a native refresh rate of 120 Hz and a reaction time of 0.1 ms, it greatly lessens motion blur and offers fluid images during frantic action situations. With compatible graphics cards, screen tearing and stuttering are also lessened by AMD FreeSync Premium and NVIDIA G-Sync support. Bright highlights and dark shadows are added to games, films, and photographs via high-dynamic range support to create realistic graphics. Additional features include a dual-port USB hub, a 20W stereo speaker system with DTS HP:X enhancement, and RGB hexagon lighting to improve the ambiance. With the provided remote control, you can control the inputs, change input settings, and access the screen menu from a convenient distance.

Smooth Graphics

To provide you with liquid-smooth images during intense, quick-paced gaming situations, this 4K display with a 3840 x 2160 resolution has a 120 Hz refresh rate and a 0.1 ms response time. A 1,500,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio, 135 nits of brightness, and 178° horizontal and vertical viewing angles are further qualities that let you see the screen well from practically any angle.

Rich Color

The LG 48GQ900-B 47.5" OLED screen offers 1.07 billion colors and has a high dynamic range. It also covers 99 percent of the DCI-P3 color gamut for vibrant, lifelike pictures whether playing video games, watching movies, or other activities. To achieve realistic blacks, pixel dimming technology is used.

Adaptive-Sync Technologies

With support for AMD's FreeSync Premium Technology and NVIDIA G-Sync, the LG 48GQ900-B 48-inch UltraGear Gaming Monitor reduces screen tearing. Both make it possible for the display to dynamically change its refresh rate to the frame rate being produced by the graphics card, significantly decreasing screen tearing, stuttering, and other abnormalities.

Turn It Up & USB Hub

The LG UltraGear 47.5" 4K HDR 120 Hz Gaming Monitor To fully immerse yourself in the music, use the 20W stereo speaker system, which supports DTS HP:X virtual surround sound. Use the integrated 2-port USB hub to quickly connect keyboards, mice, flash drives, and other peripherals to your computer through the display.

Connectivity

The LG UltraGear includes three HDMI 2.1 ports and a DisplayPort input. There is also a 3.5mm audio out jack alongside a S/PDIF output for headphones, amplifiers, and other equipment. The LG 48GQ900-B 48-inch UltraGear Gaming Monitor comes with a 03-year warranty.
